en.welcome: Welcome! What would you like to do?
en.enter_fix_amount: Enter the fixed trading amount you'd like to use.
en.enter_percent_balance: Enter the percentage of your balance you want to allocate for trading.
en.fix_amount_set: Your fixed trading amount is now set to `{}`.
en.percent_balance_set: The percentage of your balance to trade is now set to `{}`.
en.invalid_number: Please enter a valid number for the trading amount or percentage.
en.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address for your account registration.
en.set_account_type_real:
You've selected a `Real` account type. 
Please register your account email to proceed.
en.set_account_type_practice:
You've selected a `Practice` account type. 
Please register your account email to proceed.
en.account_not_found: We couldn't find your account email in our records.
en.account_credentials_not_found: Account email or password not found.
en.register_email:
Your account email has been registered successfully. 
Now, please set your account password.
en.enter_account_email: Please enter your account email to register.
en.account_registered: Congratulations! Your account has been registered successfully.
en.send_me_message: Please send me a message with your request or feedback.
en.manual: Here are the instructions for using the bot...
en.no_subscription:
It seems you don't have an active subscription. 
Please /subscribe to start using the bot.
en.register_account: Please register your account to access the bot's features.
en.scheduled: Your bot will start trading at {} in UTC-{}.
en.stopped: Your bot has been stopped. You can restart it anytime.
en.started: Your bot is now active and ready for trading.
en.trade_unsuccessful: Trade at {} unsuccessful. Please check your balance and try again.
en.deposit: Hello valued subscriber! This is a reminder about maintaining your active subscription status for `{}`. To keep your account in good standing, please deposit $`{}` to the following address: `{}`.
en.subscribed: Your subscription is active on the `{}` plan.
en.promo_code_not_applicable: This promo code is not applicable.
en.promo_code_already_registered: You've already registered this promo code.
en.description:
Are you tired of manually trading on IQ Option, constantly glued to your screen? Introducing our cutting-edge Telegram bot that automates your trading process, allowing you to earn money while you sleep!

Our bot utilizes advanced artificial intelligence to analyze market trends in real-time and execute trades with pinpoint accuracy

Say goodbye to the stress and human errors - our bot makes the best decisions to maximize your profits.
But that's not all! Our innovative membership system ensures you get the most out of our bot:
Annual and monthly subscriptions for unlimited access
3-day redeem codes to try out the bot for free
Bonus 3 days added to your subscription when a friend makes a deposit
Whether you're a beginner or an experienced trader, our bot adapts to your level and strategy. Choose from our pre-configured trading portfolios or customize the settings to your preferences

Join the community of traders who are making money while they sleep with our revolutionary IQ Option bot. Try it out for free on your demo account and experience automated trading like never before!
Join the bot now on Telegram and start trading like a pro. Your financial success is within reach!
